participant_1.name: Skylar
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and enthusiastic, always eager to share knowledge and connect with others.
participant_1.background: i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i am an animal activist. my age is too old to say. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, often using wit to navigate conversations.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
